disclaimerText: This forecast is intended to provide information on expected pollution levels in areas of significant public exposure. It may not apply in very specific locations close to unusually strong or short-lived local sources of pollution.

currentForecast.forecastSummary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Friday 10 June to end of Friday 10 June GMT
currentForecast.forecastText: Mostly cloudy on Friday with sunny intervals later.<br/><br/>Although there may be some build-up of particulates overnight on Thursday and early on Friday in very light wind or almost calm conditions, a south-westerly breeze from late morning should ensure a relatively 'clean' airflow and good dispersion of any local emissions.<br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>PM10 Particulate<br/>PM2.5 Particulate<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/>

currentForecast.forecastSummary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Saturday 11 June to end of Saturday 11 June GMT
currentForecast.forecastText: A largely fine day for Saturday although morning sunshine will give way to increasing cloud cover during the afternoon. <br/><br/>Good local dispersion is expected on a fresh south-westerly breeze which will also bear little by way of imported pollution.<br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>PM10 Particulate<br/>PM2.5 Particulate<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/>
